originalText.text: Ewa Kozikowski doesn't seams to know what is she doing.prescribes medication after medication that does t work.She will first kill people before help them.Do not go there if you have really problems find someone better.

originalText.text: I’ve been a patient of Dr.Kozikowska for about 9 years.  If I could give her office 10 stars, I would.  From the initial assessment visit that lasted about an hour, to every follow up visit that usually lasts from 15 to 25 mins - I can only say that Dr. Kozikowska is the best psychiatrist you can wish for.  Prior me becoming Dr. Kozikowska’s patient, I tried to address my issues with 5 different psychiatrists. All that experience took about 6 months, without any real progress. I ended up in the Dr. Kozikowska office in a pretty rough shape.  Her understanding and knowledge of how to deal with multiple conditions that I presented to her,  really saved me from myself.  I have been followed her every advice ever since. Dr. Kozikowska will never push any medication on you. She is very patient with her patients, and is willing to work with the person offering the least possible dose of any medication, and is always seeking your feedback on how you are progressing.  She has so many years of experience, that I trust her advice absolutely.  She’s been able to find the most effective treatment for me personally, plus she referred me to a great psychologist that also helped.  So if you ever struggle with a mood disorder, or just any disorder that fits into the area of psychiatry, you will not find a better Dr. than Dr. Kozikowska.

originalText.text:
I’ve been seeing Dr. Kozikowska for 10 years (maybe more) and she is wonderful!  She is kind, understanding, patient, and very knowledgable.  I highly recommend her for her practical and caring/understanding approach.

At the very least everyone should schedule an appointment just to speak with Teddy, the most accommodating and efficient office manager I’ve ever met.  (He even personally calls each patient the day before the appointment!)

They are a great duo!

text.text:
I’ve been seeing Dr. Kozikowska for 10 years (maybe more) and she is wonderful!  She is kind, understanding, patient, and very knowledgable.  I highly recommend her for her practical and caring/understanding approach.

At the very least everyone should schedule an appointment just to speak with Teddy, the most accommodating and efficient office manager I’ve ever met.  (He even personally calls each patient the day before the appointment!)

They are a great duo!

originalText.text: Here are a few things I love about Dr Kozikowska.  First and most important is her punctuality.  I never had to wait more than 5 minutes for my appointment and would be out in half an hour. This is great! Second (just as important) she is knowledgeable but not pushy or judgmental, which is great for this type of specialty. She does come off a bit detached but I happen to like that...I have been to doctors who have been "warm and fuzzy" but lacked knowledge and didn't help me. She did.
